object.field: As a local, independent Internet service provider, XMission provides customers with unmatched technical expertise and friendly customer service available 24/7. Since 1993, XMission has developed and supported effective connectivity, hosting, and colocation services for thousands of Utah residents and businesses. We have a variety of services to meet every requirement and for every price range. Call us, email us, or stop by our offices to customize your XMission account.

Our mission is to help grow your Company. Our whole business model is built around your future growth. If you grow we grow, so we assume a responsibility for your overall success. Our focus is on small and medium businesses (SMB), including start-up and emerging Companies.

Utah OpenTech provides value to our customers by leveraging open source software and disruptive technologies. A disruptive technology is a technical innovation that redefines the economics of a market segment. This means that our customers can implement advanced technologies at a significantly lower cost than traditional vendors. Our current focus is to help businesses take advantage of VoIP technology by using Asterisk-based solutions. By implementing these solutions, our customers will gain advanced communication features and a lower monthly phone bill.
